docs.snippet: There can be nothing but satisfaction here and in Latin America over President Eisenhower's forthcoming visit to Brazil, Argentina, Chile and Uruguay. No American President in office has ever taken this much of a voyage to Latin America. Herbert...
docs.lead_paragraph: There can be nothing but satisfaction here and in Latin America over President Eisenhower's forthcoming visit to Brazil, Argentina, Chile and Uruguay. No American President in office has ever taken this much of a voyage to Latin America. Herbert Hoover made an extensive journey as President-elect. Mr. Truman visited Rio de Janeiro in 1947 and President Eisenhower went to Panama for a conference in 1956.

docs.snippet: UNITED NATIONS, N.Y., Jan. 9 -- Aboukare, a plucky and bright-eyed 5-year-old, will be starting off for school one of these days in far-off West Africa. His education will be another gift from the United Nations official who befriended and informally...
docs.lead_paragraph: UNITED NATIONS, N.Y., Jan. 9 -- Aboukare, a plucky and bright-eyed 5-year-old, will be starting off for school one of these days in far-off West Africa. His education will be another gift from the United Nations official who befriended and informally "adopted" the youngster when he was 2.
